text: ovvor atma campatikkum ovvonraiyum kankanappavan avanallava? Appatiyiruntum; avarkal allahvukku inaikalai erpatuttukinrarkal. (Napiye!) Nir kurum; "avarkalin peyarkalaik kurunkal; allatu pumiyilulla avan ariyatavarrai ninkal avanukku arivikkinrirkala? Allatu (ninkal kuruvatu) verum varttaikal tana?" Enru. Appatiyalla! Nirakarippavarkalukku avarkalutaiya culccikal alakakak kanpikkap pattullana nervaliyiliruntu avarkal tatukkappattum vittanar. Evarai allah valiketukkirano avarai ner valiyil celuttupavar evarumillai
